What steps will reproduce the problem? Use two fingers to zoom in, but just touch the screen for a short time. What is the expected output? What do you see instead? Expect the map to zoom in, or keep the existing zoom level if the gesture is not complete, but the map will zoom out sometimes. What version of the product are you using? On what operating system? Latest master revision - 25b5f2d. Please provide any additional information below. Issue 60 added a feature "multi-touch tap to zoom out". https://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=60 Suggest to provide a method to disable this behaviour, as this behaviour can be annoying sometimes.
Original issue: http://code.google.com/p/mapsforge/issues/detail?id=527
